title: Did Chick-Phil-a just throw a bomb on the black life issue?
subtitle: The employees at one site of Chick-Phil-a were wearing blue return T-shirts long before the July 2016 protests "Black Lives Mater."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Chick-Phil-a distributed "Blue Return" T-shirts following the July 2016 protests "Black Life is a Issue."
